name: Armilla AI
headline: AI/LLM Assessment & Warranty Solutions
description:
Using industry-leading AI/LLM evaluation technology, Armilla AI provides third-party AI assessment and warranty solutions, backed by leading reinsurers Swiss Re, Greenlight Re and Chaucer. Vendors of AI-powered products leverage Armilla’s assessment to anticipate customer questions, respond to enterprise RFPs, meet regulatory requirements, build trust in the reliability of their solutions - and ultimately, to accelerate sales. 

Armilla’s clients include enterprises along with AI-first start ups & scale ups in Fintech, Insurtech, Healthtech, Legaltech, HRtech & more.

founders.name: Dan Adamson, Founder
founders.description: Dan Adamson is the CEO of AutoAlign and was a Co-Founder of Armilla.AI.   He also co-founded PointChain Technologies and previously served as OutsideIQ’s Founder and CEO until its acquisition in 2017 by Exiger, where he developed and validated AI for financial institutions and regulators globally.  He also served as Chief Architect at Medstory, an AI vertical search start-up acquired by Microsoft.  He has several search algorithm and AI patents and holds an MS degree from U.C. Berkeley.

founders.name: Karthik Ramakrishnan, Founder
founders.description: Karthik is the President and Chief Business Officer for Armilla AI. He previously led go-to-market teams at Element AI as VP. He led the AI  solutions and strategy for financial institutions and regulators globally. Previously he co-founded Blu Trumpet (CTO) and Gallop Labs (CEO). At Deloitte, he helped set up the global product factory and AI offerings. He has authored and published one of the widely cited whitepapers on Fairness evaluation of AI models and AI Enterprise strategy.

# Protect your business from AI risks
Assess and mitigate AI risks with verification and insurance
[Assess my risk![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)](http://www.armilla.ai/</contact-us>)
Trusted and recognized by
![AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b12f70a83407f6d881d5_ai.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/66aa594c5672ce51fe846b88_OECD-AI%20logo.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/66aa583c95263ff7f4eab4e4_lloyds-lab%20logo%201.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/66914022d2731e13a066cebc_Group%202609515.png)
![Privare AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b12f5a193957d14e491c_privateai.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/669140fc99cd6fbd02e8d768_Telus-Logo%201%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/66aa54d29fb768e3e32e3ea6_Skyhive%20logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/669141ae4acc44a28301d6f6_Accend%20logo%201.png)
![Hire EZ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b12f155c101d9f9b0855_hireez.svg)
![Searchlight](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b130c8545e6711fb1b2b_searchloght.svg)
![Buddi AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b130d10345ac5d3831c0_buddi-ai.svg)
## Armilla Insured
Armilla Insured provides coverage for liability, financial damages, and legal defense. Armilla Insured covers both internally and externally built models, reducing uncertainties and supporting AI adoption while protecting against residual risks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/6797b9beb84f46ca5c8fd051_Lloyds%20coverholder%20logo%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/6691420367240bb8a523be80_Armilla%20Shield%20v2%20Insured.png)
## Armilla Guaranteed
With our comprehensive model evaluation, Armilla independently validates the performance, fairness, and robustness of a given AI solution. If an Armilla Guaranteed product fails to perform as promised, your investment is protected.
Armilla insurance solutions are backed by leading insurers
![Swiss Re](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b130a81f52f983821d8f_swiss-re.svg)
![Chaucer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b130fc28424f401755a2_chaucer.svg)
![Greenlight](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e1b12f07ec20fb66c6aed8_greenlight.svg)
![Guaranteed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/66176c8ab4125dd5129eecd0_guaranteed.svg)
## Armilla Verified
Third-party testing, red-teaming and evaluation of your AI/LLM solution’s quality and reliability against industry standards, business and regulatory requirements. The Armilla Verified assessment report and badge build trust by attesting to product quality, risk mitigation, compliance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/668822bb2d45b0f617a271f9_Armilla%20Shield%20v2%20Verified.png)
![Enterprise](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e591fad547e0db23d5e127_enterprisebg.png)![Enterprise](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65ead421c00e6018810df636_enterprise.png)
### Assurance for the Enterprise
Protect against third-party AI risk, including reputational, commercial, operational, financial, and legal damages, through our AI risk management programs, model risk assessments, warranties, insurance and vendor due diligence.
[Learn more![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)](http://www.armilla.ai/</enterprise>)
![Vendor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e5963985fbfcf729d061b7_vendorbg.png)![Ai Vendors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65eac3424b60e2654cf72347_ai-vendors.png)
### Assurance for AI Vendors
Build evidence-based trust in your AI products through Armilla Verified, our AI assessment and insurance solutions. Establish a presence as a responsible AI leader, reduce customer sales cycles, and ensure AI compliance for the future.
[Learn more![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e19c927f9e3e8c48de10c4_btn-icon.svg)](http://www.armilla.ai/</vendor>)
## Armilla has you covered
![Independent third-party validation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e57f1888b3d43569739610_party-validation.svg)
Independent third-party validation
We're leaders in red-teaming and assessing AI/LLM systems. Our proprietary technology measures the quality, reliability, and security of your models, in line with regulations and standards.
![Transfer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e57f1988b3d4356973961d_transfer.svg)
Risk transfer so you can invest in more AI
AI will never be entirely risk-free. That's why we offer warranties and insurance to unlock AI's benefits while protecting you from the downsides.
![Scale your business](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e15cf052fdefda5f7d51c3/65e57f181f401f1fee5a43f6_scale-your-business.svg)
Scale your business with confidence
Our third-party risk management program and automated assessments scale cost-effectively, whether you have one model or 1000.
## Why our customers trust us
Previous
![Jesslyn Dymond](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/669580e8bcd04f5b4fe733ed_6691487b99adb78f870e6ecf_6687f99fa6cac68e8e0ceb70_Jesslyn%252520Dymond%252520profile.jpeg)
Jesslyn Dymond
TELUS
Director of Data Ethics
"Engaging Armilla AI to evaluate our generative AI support tool improved our confidence in the quality and safety of the service we provide to our customers. Trust is our priority and Armilla AI’s efforts help us ensure that our leading responsible AI frameworks are effective, comply with global standards and are ethically sound."
![Nadir Ebrahim](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/67ad08c9be1162b9f4c69b9c_Nadir%20Ebrahim%20profile.jpeg)
Nadir Ebrahim
WorkTango Inc.
CPO
“We needed absolute certain that our AI capability could process employee feedback accurately and without bias. Armilla AI exceeded our expectations with an assessment that went beyond basic pass/fail testing, it offered clear insights into how the system performs across diverse demographics and scenarios. Going through the Armilla process gave us the confidence to launch this capability across our customer base, knowing we were delivering a solution that truly serves our customers and their employees.”
![Mohan Reddy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/66aa643576dfed5b0415e541_6691487b1085f546339212cd_6687fad0c63297193751c527_Mohan%252520Reddy.jpeg)
Mohan Reddy
SkyHive (now part of Cornerstone OnDemand)
CTO
In 2024, Cornerstone OnDemand acquired SkyHive, noting Armilla’s Assessment of Skyhive’s technology as a key indicator of their commitment to responsible AI. "Armilla's third-party certification and warranty played a key role in highlighting the performance and fairness of our AI models, which made our business even more attractive to customers, and aligned with Cornerstone’s shared commitment to ethical and responsible AI."
![Patricia Thaine](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/66aa64344ef85bbd381aac6a_6691487cd4eb2a8ee0f9a1e3_6687fa6a37c0b5e405798d34_Patricia-Thaine%252520profile%2525201.png)
Patricia Thaine
Private AI
CEO
"Armilla AI’s third party verification and warranty on the performance and accuracy of our AI-powered de-identification solution has been a powerful asset in sales cycles, helping accelerate discussions with large enterprises. Customers are thrilled that we’re able to guarantee the value of our product, backed by trusted third parties like Swiss Re."
![Joseph Zhou](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/66aa64343a852e3f4b8076e6_669586a51df0d2c031799080_Joseph%2520Tianshi.jpeg)
Joseph Zhou
Accend
Co-Founder
"We needed to include an independent audit of our LLM-based risk assessment as part of a response to an RFP from a large fintech. Armilla AI conducted a comprehensive and efficient assessment, helping us meet this requirement within a tight timeline, and, unlike other third-party auditors, were able to offer a warranty guaranteeing our system KPIs. We’d highly recommend working with them."
![Walter Zhang](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/66aa6434db3c22eef624c6ca_669149694e06792ba24b5de6_Walter%2520Zhang%2520profile.webp)
Walter Zhang
hireEZ
Legal Counsel
"Armilla AI provided an efficient and comprehensive bias assessment of our candidate sourcing and matching tools, enabling our team to voluntarily align with regulations such as NYC Local Law 144 and respond to questions from customers."
![Dr. Hayley Maynard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/669580e88f2d80c1dec190dc_6691558990099cf22181966f_Hayley%2520Maynard%2520headshot%25202.png)
Dr. Hayley Maynard
Chaucer
Head of Innovation
“At Chaucer, we’re delighted to partner with Armilla to bring this new innovative product to the market. While AI creates a myriad of opportunities, it also carries material risk which is where the (re)insurance market steps in to provide cover where it’s needed, helping to close an ever-increasing AI protection gap.”
![Gianni Biason](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e5abd0163fcddf24e77e07/6695885e9b006ef1d5994d84_gianni_biason_profile.webp)
Gianni Biason
Swiss Re
Senior Underwriter, Special Risks
“We are happy to support Armilla as a leading provider of accurate and thorough model verification, and we’re hopeful that our work together will move the industry forward in producing more trustworthy machine learning products.”

### Assurance for AI Vendors
Build evidence-based trust in your AI products through Armilla Verified, our AI assessment and insurance solutions. Establish a presence as a responsible AI leader, reduce customer sales cycles, and ensure AI compliance for the future.
Learn more![Arrow⟨9⟩![Arrow⟨9⟩]](http://www.armilla.ai/</vendor>)
## Armilla has you covered
![Independent third-party validation⟨23⟩]
Independent third-party validation
We're leaders in red-teaming and assessing AI/LLM systems. Our proprietary technology measures the quality, reliability, and security of your models, in line with regulations and standards.
![Transfer⟨24⟩]
Risk transfer so you can invest in more AI
AI will never be entirely risk-free. That's why we offer warranties and insurance to unlock AI's benefits while protecting you from the downsides.
![Scale your business⟨25⟩]
Scale your business with confidence
Our third-party risk management program and automated assessments scale cost-effectively, whether you have one model or 1000.
## Why our customers trust us
Previous

Jesslyn Dymond
TELUS
Director of Data Ethics
"Engaging Armilla AI to evaluate our generative AI support tool improved our confidence in the quality and safety of the service we provide to our customers. Trust is our priority and Armilla AI’s efforts help us ensure that our leading responsible AI frameworks are effective, comply with global standards and are ethically sound."
![Nadir Ebrahim⟨27⟩]
Nadir Ebrahim
WorkTango Inc.
CPO

Going through the Armilla process gave us the confidence to launch this capability across our customer base, knowing we were delivering a solution that truly serves our customers and their employees.”

Joseph Zhou

Walter Zhang

generated_description:
Armilla AI is a Toronto-based company that specializes in AI and large language model (LLM) assessment and warranty solutions. Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Armilla AI offers a unique proposition: third-party assessment and guarantees for AI technology to manage the risks associated with its deployment.

### Mission and Value Proposition
Armilla AI's core mission focuses on AI/LLM assessment and warranty solutions, providing enterprises and AI-centric startups (especially in sectors like Fintech, Insurtech, Healthtech, Legaltech, and HRtech) with the means to evaluate their AI products effectively. By leveraging leading AI evaluation technology, Armilla helps companies anticipate customer inquiries, navigate regulatory landscapes, and establish trust, which ultimately accelerates sales.

Their services, branded under "Armilla Insured," "Armilla Guaranteed," and "Armilla Verified," cater to various needs:

- **Armilla Insured** offers coverage against liability and financial damages for both internally and externally developed AI models, making AI adoption less risky.
- **Armilla Guaranteed** validates the performance and fairness of AI solutions, ensuring that if a product fails, the investment is protected.
- **Armilla Verified** provides third-party evaluations of AI systems, assessing quality and compliance against industry standards and regulations.

### Clientele and Market Reach
Armilla AI serves a diverse array of clients, from large enterprises to agile startups, all aiming to minimize AI risks and enhance product reliability. Their partnerships with reputable reinsurers—such as Swiss Re, Greenlight Re, and Chaucer—further bolster their credibility and the trustworthiness of their solutions.

### Team and Operations
With a dedicated team of 14 employees, Armilla AI operates from Toronto and is poised for growth in the burgeoning AI assurance market. Their services are designed for scalability, catering to organizations with varying needs, from single model assessments to extensive evaluations of many AI systems.

### Why Armilla AI?
In an era where AI integration is accelerating across industries, businesses face significant risks related to reliability, compliance, and bias. Armilla AI stands out with its mixture of insurance coverage and rigorous assessment protocols, offering a safety net for companies that increasingly rely on AI technologies. Their testimonials from high-profile clients—highlighting improvements in trust, compliance, and marketability—underscore the effectiveness of their solutions.

If you want to learn more about their offerings, check out their [website](http://www.armilla.ai). Whether you’re a vendor or an enterprise user, Armilla AI positions itself as a crucial partner in navigating the complex landscape of AI assurance.
